quotes.quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
True courage is a result of reasoning. A brave mind is always impregnable.
Growth is never by mere chance; it is the result of forces working together.
If you focus on results, you will never change. If you focus on change, you will get results.
When you're committed to something, you accept no excuses, only results.
You may never know what results come of your actions, but if you do nothing, there will be no results.
The results you achieve will be in direct proportion to the effort you apply.
Success action is cumulative in its results.
However beautiful the strategy, you should occasionally look at the results.
There is no such thing as failure. There are only results.
The achievements of an organization are the results of the combined effort of each individual.
The greater the faith, the greater the result.
You don't need to have extraordinary effort to achieve extraordinary results. You just need to do the ordinary, everyday things exceptionally well.
The only way to accomplish big results is to think big and set big goals.
Excellence is the gradual result of always striving to do better.
Success isn't a result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.
Enjoy your work so that others may enjoy the results.
It is great to be introspective, self analysis can be useful, but only if it results in action.
Doing well is the result of doing good. That's what capitalism is all about.
Successful people ask better questions, and as a result, they get better answers.
An agreement cannot be the result of an imposition.
The person who sends out positive thoughts activates the world around him positively and draws back to himself positive results.
People have been known to achieve more as a result of working with others than against them.
Our life always expresses the result of our dominant thoughts.
TEAMWORK: the fuel that allows common people attain uncommon results.
Commitment comes as a result of choice, not conditions.
Success is peace of mind, which is a direct result of self-satisfaction in knowing you made the effort to become the best of which you are capable.
